last_episode_to_air.name: Cabin Fever
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ian and Nancy Blackburn's lifeless bodies are discovered stuffed into the trunk of their own car; the investigation unmasks a monster who hides in plain sight.

name: The Lake Erie Murders
overview: Lake Erie is home to some of North America’s darkest and deadliest murder cases. Dive deep into its most notorious mysteries and hear insight from the detectives working on the frontline of these shocking investigations.

episodes.name: Who Killed Amy Mihaljevic? Part 1: Missing
episodes.overview: In October 1989, 10 year old Amy Mihaljevic is lured to a suburban Ohio shopping mall by an unknown man--and is never seen again. A 30 year mystery and nationwide manhunt ensues--thousands of leads, hundreds of suspects, one killer still at large...

episodes.name: Who Killed Amy Mihaljevic? Part 2: The Hunt
episodes.overview: Amy's killer remains at large. A cavalcade of suspects emerges, each more compelling than the last. Investigators explore each one. And then, 106 days after Amy was taken, a gruesome discovery some 50 miles away from her Bay Village home. A body.

episodes.name: Who Killed Amy Mihaljevic? Part 3: New Evidence
episodes.overview: Amy's killer remains on the loose. The case goes nationwide. Margaret appears on Oprah. Anniversaries come and go. And then, finally, a confession. A man stands up in church in a neighboring town and declares: "I killed Amy Mihaljevic "

episodes.name: High School Horror
episodes.overview: When the body of beautiful high school student Debbie Gama is discovered in a creek wrapped in wire, the ensuing investigation ends up uncovering more than her murderer, revealing a secret world of twisted sex, drugs, sadomasochism and bondage.

episodes.name: Alley of Death
episodes.overview: When 14-year old Gloria Pointer is found raped and murdered in an alleyway, it is the start of a thirty-year quest for answers by her mother who will not give up until she finds justice for her daughter.

episodes.name: The Butcher of Buffalo
episodes.overview: Mother of three Joan Giambra is discovered strangled, lying naked under her comatose 11-year old daughter. The young girl becomes the only hope of catching a serial killer but will she remember his identity before he comes back to silence her too?

episodes.name: Blood In the Water
episodes.overview: When a bag containing body parts washes up on the shore of the lake, the search for missing 10-year-old Holly Jones becomes a grisly murder investigation. Police must race to find the perpetrator of this crime before another child is murdered.

episodes.name: Devil at the Crossroads
episodes.overview: Shauna Howe, only 11 years old, disappears as she returns home from a Girl Scout Halloween party; when Shauna's body shows up in a local creek, her murder ignites an investigation whose conclusion sends a shockwave through her community.

episodes.name: The Vanishing Teens
episodes.overview: In the fall of 1991, rural Michigan is plunged into paranoia and fear when four local teenage girls vanish without a trace; the community is in lockdown as residents face up to the very real possibility that a predator walks among them.

episodes.name: Unholy Communion
episodes.overview: A devoted fiancé discovers that his beloved partner, Anne Boncella, and her 8-year-old daughter have been murdered; the ensuing investigation will unravel shocking secrets that have been dormant in their seemingly peaceful hometown.

episodes.name: Black Sabbath
episodes.overview: In Toledo, Ohio, Sister Margaret Ann is discovered dead in the chapel on Holy Saturday morning; police mount an investigation that will unearth the lies and secrets leading to her death.

episodes.name: Heartbreak Hotel
episodes.overview: Beautiful Northwestern Airlines flight attendant Nancy Ludwig is discovered dead in her hotel room, her body mutilated and head almost decapitated. It will take the discovery of links to another heinous killing to blow the case wide open.

episodes.name: Night Shift Nightmare
episodes.overview: The body of 19-year-old Wanda Musk is found just miles from where she worked at local gas station; suspicions mount over several young men in the community, including her ex-boyfriend and a troubled local teen.

episodes.name: Trail of Frozen Tears
episodes.overview: Pretty pre-teen Rosie Davenport is found brutally murdered in an abandoned house, the circumstances of her death eerily similar to the unsolved murder of 13-year-old Malissa Thomas one year earlier. Could police have a serial killer on their hands?

episodes.name: Killer Night Out
episodes.overview: In 1983 in Ohio, a 19-year-old nurse's aide is found dead after a night out with her best friend. A riveting investigation reveals her fate.

episodes.name: Trail of Fear
episodes.overview: After a 74-year-old woman is found murdered, suspicion and paranoia take control of a community. Next, a young girl vanishes, exposing secrets hidden for decades.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: Ian and Nancy Blackburn's lifeless bodies are discovered stuffed into the trunk of their own car; the investigation unmasks a monster who hides in plain sight.
